function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 in tropical climates due to heat intolerance of the virus and breakdown of lipid bilayer","Impact":"Increased difficulty in controlling the spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce indirect and secondary transmission, and enhance surface cleaning and disinfection","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration and purification systems, UV-C disinfection technology","People":"Population in tropical climates","Owner":"Health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Seasonality and environmental influences on the spread of respiratory pathogens","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to infections due to environmental factors and limited immunity","Mitigation":"Enhance public health education, promote vaccination programs, and monitor environmental conditions","Technologies":"Health tracking and monitoring systems, public health communication platforms","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health organizations and government agencies"},{"Description":"Increased viral stability and reproduction in cold temperatures","Impact":"Greater likelihood of virus survival and reproduction in cold weather","Mitigation":"Implement measures to improve indoor ventilation, heating, and humidity control","Technologies":"HVAC systems, indoor air quality sensors, smart thermostats","People":"Population in cold climate regions","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
